name: THE TAROTTER
description:
Tarot cards can change the outcome of your dungeon crawling chaos as you battle your way past, demons, ghosts and more to break out of a crystal ball an evil wizard put you in. Then play it again with different random cards, with a balance between luck and skill. 

This game was made for the GMTK 2022 in 30 hours, with the theme "Roll of the Dice."

Programmer: Dr. Didjet, found here. Youtube Twitter

Cutscene Artist: Mr. Socks Animation, found here. Pixel Art

Artist: Press UP Studios, found here. Youtube Twitter
